Elon Musks controversial Grokipedia has begun creeping into ChatGPT and other chatbots responses as a cited source, giving us a glimpse of the dead internet that’s just around the corner.

news.title: OpenAI Invests in Sam Altman’s New Brain Tech Startup Merge Labs
